name: W9/10 ShapeSnap
description:
Week Nine. Game Nine.

This week's game is a puzzle game. Click a shape and drag toward a matching shape to  attempt a match. If you send one shape across the screen to a matching shape, you earn bonus points for any matching shapes you hit while it travels. If you mismatch a shape, or hit a shape that doesn't match while trying to match shapes, you lose a life.  Lose three lives and it's game over. Avoid letting too many shapes fill up the screen to avoid an early game over.
